docs.snippet: A Trump administration aide corrected herself on Friday after being widely criticized for referencing a 2011 "Bowling Green massacre" in Kentucky that never occurred to defend President Donald Trump's temporary ban on immigrants from seven Muslim-...
docs.lead_paragraph: A Trump administration aide corrected herself on Friday after being widely criticized for referencing a 2011 "Bowling Green massacre" in Kentucky that never occurred to defend President Donald Trump's temporary ban on immigrants from seven Muslim-majority countries.

headline.main: Trump Aide Cites 'Massacre' That Never Occurred to Defend Immigrant Ban
headline.print_headline: Trump Aide Cites 'Massacre' That Never Occurred to Defend Immigrant Ban
